item.title: Report 3: Public key encryption and pgp
item.description: Report 3: Public key encryption and pgp ðŸ”—Instructions ðŸ”—A report based on the homework 3 (h3 public key encryption and pgp) on the course ICT Security Basics - from Trust to Blockchain - ICT4HM103-3003, 2022 Spring, Haaga-Helia University of Applied Sciences given by teacher Tero Karvinen. a) Read and summarize (with 1-5 bullet points for each heading) Schneier 2015: Applied Cryptography Chapter 1: Foundations b) Give two examples of public key cryptography (other than PGP).
